articles.title: 'You made it through winter': Anthony Scaramucci shares 3 reasons why he's still bullish on bitcoin
articles.description: "Every single Wall Street firm is going to have a bitcoin ETF in their arsenal," the Skybridge Capital founder told attendees at Messari Mainnet.
articles.content:

articles.title: Tech drags US stocks lower as Oracle drops and Apple slides after iPhone event
articles.description: The Nasdaq dropped for the first time in three days and tech names broadly moved lower. Investors are bracing for the August CPI report.
